attributes.action: drive the abolition of the EU law outlawing the sale of seeds that are not on a register of breeds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since the 1970s it has been a crime bu EY law to sell seeds (vegetable specifically) that have not been 'tested' and 'validated' and included into an EU database of seed varieties.

This is causing older varieties to die out and is drastically reducing the variety of genetic material available for breeding of new varieties.

We move to have this law abolished to make older seeds that are more suited to growing in specific areas available for general use through normal channels.
